title: Sweet Selfie - Beauty Camera & Best Photo Editor
description:
The best selfie photo editor and beauty camera with all features: face tune, body retouch, blur background, and trendy filters, live stickers and artistic effects.

300,000,000 users worldwide take selfies every day with Sweet Selfie.  Featured by Google PlayüèÜ, top beauty camera and photo editor with makeup, helps you take perfect and sharable selfies with ease, edit beautiful photos, pictures, and videos even boomerang for Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp, Messenger, TikTok, Wechat, etc.

‚≠êSelfie Camera with beauty effects‚≠ê

* Pro beauty camera: The Sweet Selfie camera can help you take perfect selfies with ease.

* Snapchat Face filters: Face changer provides 1000+ snapchat funny face changer filters to easily get your face swap or makeovers.

* Photo stickers: Tons of cute photo stickers for you to choose, including emoji photo stickers, dog face filters and so much more photo stickers.

‚≠êFace Tune - Selfie Editor‚≠ê

* Smooth skin: beauty camera can retouch skin tone by using exclusive skin smoothing makeover tool, which can also bring you perfect face and selfie pictures.

* Teeth whitener: beauty editor with teeth whitening brings out the natural beauty in your smile

* Perfect Eyes: Erase bags and dark circles beneath your eyes, brighten your eyes

* Acne & Pimple remover: remove acnes & pimples with just a tap to make skin problems disappear

* Adjust facial features: slim face, red eye remover, plump up lips, grow a taller nose bridge

‚≠êMakeup Camera - Essential Tools‚≠ê

* Makeover lips, eyes, brows, teeth, contour, blusher and more instantly

* Try makeovers from glamorous makeup looks by using this Makeup tools

‚≠êBody Retouch - Reshape Body‚≠ê

* Body editor: With our body shape editor, perfect body shape edited by adjusting your waist, breast, taller, abs and pecs.

* Skin tone changer: Change your skin color/tone to look younger.

‚≠êProfessional Photo Editing‚≠ê

* Blur photo editor: Choose radical and linear blur effect to blur the unwanted part of your image with a tap.

* Crop photo editor: The perfect selfie and photo is just one crop away, tap to resize and trim

* Background Changer: Change your background color or shape to teardrop-shaped, corrugated shape

* Other features: You can adjust the brightness, contrast, vignette, fade, temperature, saturation, sharpen, etc.

‚≠êCollage Maker & Photo Grid‚≠ê

* Photo collage maker provides tons of free preset templates & layouts

* You can choose Multi-Grid with/without white border or Funny Themed pic collage from our Photo collage maker to arrange your pic collage in freestyle

Additional Features

* Cutout: Background eraser editor can help you eraser the unwanted part of your image and add new background. Besides, you can also adjust photo filters, add texts and various stickers.

* Touch Capture: Just tap the screen and a perfect selfie will show you.

* Selfie Timer built in so you can get off the perfect hands-free shot.

* Multiple face recognition lets you go for the group shot.

Sweet Selfie is a powerful photo editor & pro beauty camera with all features. With Sweet Selfie app, you can remove pimples and acnes, smooth skin, brighten eyes , whiten teeth, change skin tone, add face filters and photo effects, blur photo backgrounds and so much more everything you want by Beauty Camera & Photo Editor. Sweet Selfie can meet all you needs about selfies.

With real-time beauty effects, you can take selfies easily and save it even without editing, and share your selfies to popular social sites like Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp, Messenger, TikTok, Wechat, etc by one click.

title: Candy Camera - selfie, beauty camera, photo editor
description:
Let‚Äôs take a selfie!
With Candy Camera‚Äôs beautifying filters and silent mode,
You can take beautiful selfies anywhere and anytime!


Don‚Äôt miss out on Candy Camera‚Äôs amazing filters ‚Äì
7,000,000 people taking selfies with Candy Camera every day!

‚òÖ Filters for Selfies
A diverse range of filters, designed specifically for selfies ‚Äì
Every Candy Camera filter will make your skin look amazing!
Swipe left and right to change between filters,
And find the perfect beautifying filter for a selfie!
Candy Camera‚Äôs filters are shown real-time while you take a selfie,
So you always look and feel beautiful with Candy Camera‚Äôs filters!

‚òÖ Beauty Functions
In addition to the filter camera, there are additional editing tools for the perfect selfie -
Slimming, whitening, concealer, lipstick, blush, eyeliner, mascara!
Edit or use make-up stickers to look beautiful in all your selfies.
Candy Camera is the ultimate beauty tool for selfies!

‚òÖ Stickers
Stickers for every season, occasion, and trend!
Decorate your selfie with Candy Camera‚Äôs huge sticker collection ‚Äì
New stickers are being added to Candy Camera with every update!
You can find cute stickers for your selfies and artistic ones for your photography.
Each sticker can be easily resized and moved using multi-touch!

‚òÖ Silent Camera
Take silent selfies, snapshots, or photography anywhere you go!
Candy Camera‚Äôs silent mode can be used for any occasion ‚Äì
Never be embarrassed to take a selfie, the camera is silent!

‚òÖ Collage
Take multiple photos for a collage!
Choose from many different grids and styles ‚Äì
Taking selfies with Candy Camera‚Äôs collage mode,
You‚Äôll feel like you‚Äôre in a photo booth with filters.
Have fun taking selfies with your friends!

PERMISSIONS
‚Ä¢ CAMERA: Taking photos and videos
‚Ä¢ ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION: Adding geo tags in photos
‚Ä¢ RECORD_AUDIO: Recording audio during videos
‚Ä¢ READ_PHONE_STATE: Signing up for CandyCall with phone number
‚Ä¢ READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Editing photos from SD card

For more fun with Candy Camera, please follow us!

Instagram: http://instagram.com/candycameraofficial

title: BeautyPlus - Easy Photo Editor & Selfie Camera
description:
800 million selfies edited by BeautyPlus? What? Find out why 300 million choose BeautyPlus to edit their selfies, pictures and videos every single month. Here's a hint: BeautyPlus offers simple, yet powerful photo editing tools, artistic effects, augmented reality (AR) filters and so much more to take your selfie game to the next level. So, let's get ready to post the best selfie to your social media account!
 
Spread some Christmas cheer with the powerful selfie editing feature of BeautyPlus and have some fun with the cute filters.
 
Creating beautiful and natural looking photo and video selfies has never been easier. With BeautyPlus you can erase acne marks, smooth skin, brighten eyes, whiten teeth, edit eye color, add filters and special effects, blur photos and so much more.
 
It‚Äôs our little secret!
BeautyPlus has worked with well-known makeup artists, photographers and real people just like you to develop the perfect photo editing app - a tool that is both easy to use and gives flawless selfies. Selfie edits are so subtle no one will ever suspect you‚Äôve used an app, allowing you to show off your natural beauty without harsh filters.
 
Skin Editor
+ Beauty camera adds a radiant complexion for perfect face and selfie pictures
+ Retouch skin tone using our exclusive skin smoothing makeover tool
+ Blemish remover lets you make pimples and other skin problems disappear with just a tap
 
Perfect Eyes
+ Erase bags and dark circles beneath your eyes
+ Brighten eyes and make them pop in photos
+ Edit eye color to match your hair color and hairstyle using custom contacts
 
Create The Perfect Smile
+ Beauty editor with teeth whitening brings out the natural beauty in your smile
+ Take a perfect selfie with a clean smile every time
 
Live Auto-Retouch (NEW!!!)
Need to do a quick retouch? Let our selfie editor do the work for you! Retouch using multiple special effects, and instantly preview your photo or video live in BeautyPlus. Pick the one you want and take your flawless photo or video with just one click and flaunt it on your social media account.
 
Magic Brush
Give your selfies and photos a fantastic new look with our unique effect brushes: Glow, Neon, Stars, Hearts and so much more to satisfy your imagination about funny selfie. Enjoy finger painting with numerous colors!
 
Professional Photo Editing
+ Blur: Selfies instantly take on a professional look with a quick blur. Just swipe to apply the effect!
+ Crop: The perfect selfie and photo is just one crop away! Tap to resize and trim
+ Photo Filters: From the romantic to the dramatic, we have dozens of special filters to make your selfies and pictures pop
+ Professional Control: Enlarge, Stretch, Slim and Rotate features give you the freedom to edit your selfies and photos the way you want!
 
Additional Features
+ Selfies aren‚Äôt everything - BeautyPlus works with both the front-facing and outer-facing camera
+ Selfie Timer built in so you can get off the perfect hands-free shot
+ Multiple face recognition lets you go for the group shot!
+ Perfect lighting even in the darkest locations. Low light? No problem! BeautyPlus automatically adjusts exposure
+ Ready for sharing. When you are done editing, you can share to popular social sites like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and Snapchat! 
 
Share your photos (and feedback) with us!
‚Ä¢ Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/beautypluscom

  
Device Compatibility
The vast majority of all BeautyPlus tools and features will function on most devices. However, our AR filters require storage space of at least 1GB and a minimum resolution of 480x854; if your device does not meet these specifications then the AR filters will not be available.

title: HD Camera Pro & Selfie Camera
description:
HD Camera Pro is a fully featured free Camera app, with Quick Snap, Gorgeous Camera Effects you can easily take HD Quality photo on Android phones and tablets. 
HD Camera Pro contains professional capture mode, the highest level with a professional camera. It has utilized all advantage of your phone or tablet.
Touch up your candy selfie with our quick and easy features and get the best results. Snap the perfect selfie and find your favorite look.

Key features:
* Face Detection alternative.
* Real-time Filter ‚Äì Preview filter effect before taking pictures or shooting videos.
* Easy to use‚Äì Intuitive interface.
* HDR ‚Äì Improve images captured in low-light and backlit scenes. 
* Beauty Selfie ‚Äì One tap to beautify your selfie.
* Quick Snap
* Open the Pro captuer mode
* Support for focus modes, Scene modes, color effects, white balance, ISO, and exposure compensation/lock, torch.
* Choose camera and video quality and resolution.
* HD Video recording.
* Auto-stabilize 
* Dynamic range optimisation mode.
* Continuous shooting
* Handy remote controls: Set a timer,
* Brightness settings
* Location targeting feature
* Disable shutter sound.
* Configurable volume keys.
* Take photo remotely by making a noise(e.g., voice, whistle)
* A date and time stamp on photos, location coordinates and implements a custom text.
* Support multi-touch gesture for zoom and single-touch control.
* Small file size.
* Photo Collage & Powerful photo editing features.

HD Camera Pro allow you to shoot excellent photo in a fast and simply way.  Stylize your pictures with HD camera selfie filters and Pro capture mode now.

Notes:
The special permissions for use
1, android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
Camera can remember your photos and videos location if you wish. Other apps can access this information along with your saved images.
2, android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Save the capture photos and videos.

title: HD Camera - Best Selfie Camera & Beauty Camera
description:
HD Camera is a new design camera tool for selfie camera, with powerful photo editing and collage features you can take beautiful selfies anywhere and anytime!
HD Camera is a fully featured Camera app which utilized all advantage of your phone or tablet. Let you snaps quick and easy photos and videos.

Key features:
- camera and video features
- 3 modes: camera, video recorder & panorama
- Auto Optimization and HDR for high-quality photos
- multi filters for Selfies
- Next Level Video Recording
- smart panorama shooting 
- smart auto beautify
- silent mode
- Fine-tuned auto focus
- Countdown Timer
- Dynamic user interface (phone/tablet)
- Picture quality setting
- White balance settings(Incandescent, Fluorescent, Auto, Daylight,Cloudy)
- Screen mode settings(Action, Night, Sunset, Play)
- Location targeting
- Configurable volume keys

Powerful Photo Editor
1. Easy to make photo collage
2. Crop your photos
3. Auto Optimization
4. Amazing photo filters and effects
5. Change brightness, contrast, saturation and color temperature for your photos

Although in the current market, there are have many kinds of camera applications, but we still think this HD Camera is the most efficient one and able to meet all your phone camera needs. 

Notes:
The special permissions for use
1, android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
HD Camera can remember your photos and videos location if you wish. Other apps can access this information along with your saved images.

2, android.permission.READ_CONTACTS
After you take a photo,  you can share with others. HD Camera need to read the contacts information and help you share photos via email, SMS, or other apps.
others. HD Camera need to read the contacts information and help you share photos via email, SMS, or other apps.

3, android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
When you finished to take a photo or video, Hd Camera need this permission to save your photos and videos on EXTERNAL STORAGE

comments: Good morning, I don't know why but today my device was scanned by the antivirus and it appeared that a malware or virus called scam-app is in the app I downloaded directly from here and when the antivirus scanned again it appeared that the same malware or virus was still in the app and the only available option in the antivirus to get rid of this is to uninstall the app. I hope you can solve this soon so the app can be totally free of viruses and malware.

(1) I used this app for more than 10 years, with it's private password protected storage vault. But just like everybody else, they got a little taste of success, so they had to get greedy and start charging for every pissy little' option and add-on that used to come in one big bundle for free. (2) I just installed another old app that I used to pay for (Go SMS Pro) these two are tied together, so I'm gonna give them another chance.

I opted in for the FREE 3-DAY TRIAL, Nov.10, 2019 and cancelled my trial Nov. 11, 2019 and was charged on November 12th. I was able to do much better picture editing with an app that I already have installed on my phone prior to this SUPPOSED FREE TRIAL I want a REFUND. My card should have never been charged. I wish there was a way to give ZERO STARS for my review.

Pops up all the time when I don't need it and is a pain to shut back off. When I'm working, every second is important and the time it took me to get out and close the app, someone else got the contract instead of me. Time is money and your app cost me both!! NOT HAPPY!!!!!

I would give 0 stars if possible. They offer 3 day trial 'cancel anytime'. I have tried everything and I cannot find a way to cancel my subscription, the instructions they gave me do not work. DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP IF YOU DO NOT INTEND TO PAY FOR IT

title: Facetune2 - Selfie Photo Editor
description:
Want to look amazing in every selfie you take? Facetune2 is an easy to use photo editor that acts as your own personal glam squad. Get that Insta-worthy picture every time with mobile editing tools, features and filters.

Facetune2, the next generation of the award-winning Facetune selfie editor app, provides an amazing, new, collection of the best pro retouching features. Glam yourself up or go for a more natural look with the best makeup and beauty editing app on the market! Make fun and powerful edits with ease by using our super-advanced technology behind every magical and easy-to-use tool. In only a few swipes, you can whiten teeth, remove blemishes & pimples, smooth out skin, correct bad lighting, contour faces and upgrade makeup! Want to wow friends and followers with your photos? Leave reality behind and live your fantasy with Facetune2!

üî•üî•üßö‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èExperience the incredible magic of Facetune 2‚Äôs selfie editing now!ü¶Ñüî•üî•

Remove Zits, Pimples & Blemishes 

- Get rid of zits, pimples and blemishes within seconds. 
- In a few taps, our advanced tools will remove any pores, blemishes or pimples and will 
  soften your skin.

üëÅ Brighter Eyes & Whiter Teeth

- Use Whiten to get that million dollar smile with whiter teeth.
- Swipe over your teeth to easily whiten them or widen your smile. üëÑ
- Use Details to accentuate features you like. Brighten your eyes and make them 
  sparkle.
- Remove red-eye.

üíÅ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Smooth Skin

- Use Smooth to airbush your skin to get a smoother, softer look.
- Edit, retouch and refine any part of your skin to make it look natural and soft in every 
  photo. 
- Blot away the shine from oily skin.

üíÑ Professional Tools for Selfie and Photo Editing

- Easily enlarge or minimize features & make them skinnier or wider.
- Easy compare tool at every step to compare before & after.
- Use Reshape to slim or re-adjust your selfie and enhance the features you like in your 
  photo.

üé® Artistic Tools

- Enjoy editing features and retouching tools like fun & colorful light effects.
- Use makeup brushes to paint hair or skin.
- Tap to crop, blur, and fine-tune your pics for a beautiful look.
- Retouch your selfie and edit your photos with a variety of professional tools.

Top-of-the-art Technology for Photo Editing

- Retouch your selfies, choose from dozens of filters, blur your background and touch up 
  your features using sophisticated photo editing tools.
- Get impeccable results and step up your selfie game with professional-looking photos.

Live filters for your selfies

- Edit your photo after snapping your selfie and enhance features in real-time.
- Fine-tune your photo and use different tools before you upload your pic to get a 
  stunning result.


Vibrant, Glowing Filters

- Facetune2 filters upgrade every selfie and photo for a fashionable look.
- A wide range of high-quality beauty filters for unique editing and sense of style.

Step up your social game and share your selfies

- Facetune2 gets every photo 100% ready to dominate your social feed. Use our magical 
  photo editing tools to enhance the features you like and share your photos to social 
  media.

- Terms of use: http://facetuneapp.appspot.com/files/facetune-terms.pdf

- Privacy policy: http://www.facetuneapp.com/files/facetune-privacy.pdf

Stay on top of the latest photo, selfie and beauty trends! Share your pictures and selfies with us for a chance to be featured!

comments: Shameless app. Renewed my subscription on February 18, 2020 for ‚Ç©12,000 per year. On March 15, 2020, when I routinely opened the app, I found out that 1) I was no longer Facetune VIP (even when I paid for a yearly subscription less than a month before), 2) the prices had gone up (from ‚Ç©12,000 per year to ‚Ç©25,000), and 3) the 'restore purchase' button didn't work at all. Since I desperately needed the app's features on the spot, I purchased the yearly subscription fully aware that I was being unjustly ripped off. Completely shameful in my opinion, and I demand a full refund of ‚Ç©25,000.

Hello, I recently wrote a wonderful review because I believe this app is really great. However, I am returning today and am experiencing some problems. Whenever I go back into the app (after it crashes and returns me to my home screen) it displays a black screen and will continue to glitch. This is very offputting after full cooperation the previous times. Is there a way to fix this? A reply would greatly help. Though this is happening, it's an astounding app. Thank you!

I love this app! There are lots of fun things you can do with it, but I have 2 major issues with it... 1) you can't save ANY of your edited pictures (after the first couple of "teaser/intro" ones) without either watching an ad OR paying for the Pro version, and 2) the Pro version is WAY too damn much (min. $24 up to $100)! Otherwise, it's awesome!

I've seen other people use Facetune2 and they have so many more features than I have access to. For example, other users are able to selectively increase color vibrancy on only some parts of the picture. I can't find that feature anywhere on the app. Another example is the "restore" tool in the reshape option. I don't have the restore tool but again, it would be really useful. I don't understand why this app is missing these tools.

Used to love the original Facetune. Was a bit annoying that the second one came with purchases but there were enough free features for it to still be perfectly usable. However now you have to either purchase the pro version or watch an ad every time you want to save a picture. Put me completely off the app as a whole. I'll find something else that doesn't bombard me with ads thanks.

comments: Trying to edit the photos with "makeup" is pointless because you can't change the thickness of the lipstick and the eyeshadow color you choose is not the same color applied to the photo! The preinstalled photo editor app on my phone does better than this!!!
App is crashing like hell recently . I have shared feedback also but no help received . As soon as I'm opening the app , it shuts down suddenly. It's very frustrating üò£

Very basic tools. You are not able to change the size of the various tools, so if you need to get a small area, you're out of luck. Does not come with a basic hue-change type tool, just overlays that change the value beneath, giving you a sort of faded out effect as it covers lighting and crisp details. The reshaping tools are limited to enlarge, shrink, and smudge. You can choose the size of these (no more/less effect option though), but for subtle changes you're going to have a hard time.

Previously I rated this app with only 2 stars because it was using up 34 GB of phone storage. But I figured out that I could fix that by going to settings>apps>photo editor>storage - and then select clear data and clear cache. I wasn't sure if all the editing work I had done would be lost if I did that but it turns out that my edited photos were not affected. I love this editing app 2nd to photoshop express. I mostly use it for cloning (much better/easier than PSE for cloning) & adding text.
This app is amazing! I have edited some of my pictures and sceenshots to look more beautiful and it totally works

title: Selfie Geojit
description:
Selfie Mobile is a next generation trading and investing platform of Geojit, which empowers investors and offers them an unparalleled user experience. Users can transact in equities, derivatives, currencies and Mutual Funds - both lump sum and SIP. 

This Android version is advanced, user friendly and highly flexible with an intelligent interface that makes trading secure, smooth and enriching. Users will benefit from the full spectrum view of the markets. Its advanced charting facilities allow even inexperienced users to obtain a clear picture of the markets. Selfie also enables quick order execution and offline order facility to place orders outside market hours. Furthermore, this 24 X 7 trading facility is fully linked to our bank payment facilities allowing users to quickly initiate pay-in and pay-out. 

The advanced features of Selfie include:

‚Ä¢ Multiple market watches with real-time update.
‚Ä¢ Customisation of scrip view with Grid and List option.
‚Ä¢ Index can be added to market watch.
‚Ä¢ Order placing facility in NSE/BSE/Derivative/Currency/Mutual Funds/SIPs.
‚Ä¢ Holistic view of all your holdings in a single page with real time price update.
‚Ä¢ Access to Trade Book/Order Book/Portfolio.
‚Ä¢ Option Chain, Option calculator and F&O Margin calculator.
‚Ä¢ Dynamic real-time charts with technical studies and drawing styles such as Candle stick/Line/Bar/Mountain etc. 
‚Ä¢ One click order placement facility from Charts/Research Reports/Option   Chain/MBP/Portfolio.
‚Ä¢ Configurable views and themes.
‚Ä¢ Research recommendations and regular alerts to facilitate intelligent decision making.  
‚Ä¢ Configurable fast order facility to place orders more conveniently.
‚Ä¢ Multi View of a single scrip (Graph, MBP, News, Recommendations and Security Info in a single screen) 
‚Ä¢ Top Rankings for NSE/BSE with Gainers/Losers volumes and values.
‚Ä¢ Pop Ups on Order confirmation/ Order Execution/ Research Recommendations.
‚Ä¢ Mutual Fund recommendations as a single watch.
‚Ä¢ Pay-in and Pay-out facility.
‚Ä¢ Push notification on Research recommendations and information.
‚Ä¢ Reach our Customer Care in a single click using 'Call Us' facility.

Feedback
* Kindly rate Selfie Mobile app. We value your feedback.

recentChanges: Fixes and enhancements
comments: LOTS OF BUGS. Unable to use it for more than 2mins. The app hangs up even more after the recent update. Upon minimising and going back it showing a blank black screen. The levels and studies are not shown properly. Figures are wrong and not updated. HIGHLY UNRELIABLE for day trading. Fix this ASAP and keep monitoring this. Absolutely hideous management by the IT Dept.

Have been using from 2 years. Ratings never touched 4 stars in play store. No matter how many times they release updates including latest update, pivot points on chart doesn't work. Six months back, written a detailed mail to customer care team about absence of pivot point, EMA on charts to absence of Candlesticks chart in multi view screen and preloaded NIFTY50 or other Index constituents watchlist. All I got is an email acknowledgement and no improvement in subsequent app updates / releases.

Please fix the bugs app is not working properly it's like automatically log out when you log in,order status and portfolio not showing when you touch the icon then we need to log in again then only it shows.please do the need full thank you inlast few days chart is not working. please do the needful...... again itz not working.. am using latest version

A lot of improvement is required in UI to make it user friendly as well as to analyse the stocks. Many fancy options are there (like Tips service) which most of the users do not use, but Geojit charges high AMC for 'providing those wastes' to customers. The bank transfer (pay-in) through this App is crashing everytime. Even today i tried for 8-10 times, still no use. Overall, not satisfied with the App. (Even planning to change the broker when thinking of buying/selling cos of high brokerage)
The new version is full of bugs. Gets hang every time when we switch into another app. Proper data is not showing in the app or takes lot of time to update.

title: AirBrush: Easy Photo Editor
description:
Who says we can‚Äôt have perfection in our photos? We believe all users should have the best editor and filter technology at their fingertips, and AirBrush continually updates with new features and effects to stay up to date with editing standards. AirBrush was designed to be the best photo editor with user-friendly retouch tools, cool filter options, and natural, beautiful results!

Features:

Blemish and Pimple Remover
** Say goodbye to pimples and blemishes! With our blemish remover, you can eliminate pimples and unwanted spots with the tap of a finger. Add a swipe of blush to add radiance and charm.

Whiten Teeth and Brighten Eyes
** Whitening your teeth takes your smile to the next level! Our teeth whitening function lets you brighten your smile without over-whitening.
** Our ‚Äúbrighten‚Äù function enhances your eyes to instantly light up your features.

Perfect Skin in Every Photo
** Retouch, edit and even tan your skin to achieve perfect, glowing perfection in just a few swipes! Your skin will look naturally radiant in all of your selfies and photos! For an added bonus, swipe on a cool blush or rouge to give your cheeks an extra glow.

Slim, Reshape and Lengthen Your Selfie or Photo
** Instantly slim, lengthen or reshape any area of your photo with a few swipes of your finger.

Artistic Retouching Features
** In addition its HD editing features, the AirBrush editor also includes tools that let you blur, crop, stretch, slim and tune your pics for an artistic, beautiful and dramatic touch. Choose to automatically retouch your pictures or fix them manually.

Add Depth and Style to Your Photos
** Our ‚ÄúBlur‚Äù editing tool lets you retouch any photos to give it more depth and keep only the things that matter in focus. Your photos and pics will embody the cool perfection seen in professional photography.

Real-Time Editing Technology
** Edit your selfie before taking the picture with real-time editing tools. See your shot on your phone, choose your edits and filters, then snap the photo for a perfect pics every time!

Natural, Radiant Filters
** AirBrush beauty filters were professionally designed to enhance even the best pictures and selfie photos for a perfect, beautiful finishing touch. Some filters can add natural-looking makeup to your pics, like blush or mascara!

Ready to Share?
** This is the editing tool that really gets your picture ready for sharing. When you‚Äôre done editing, share your pics to popular social sites like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Snapchat right from AirBrush!

Follow us on our official accounts and share your selfies, pictures and comments with us!

comments: Been using the free version of this app for surely nearly five years or so now, and Ive never had a single problem with it, has all the features it had when I first got it and its only gotten better since then. Easy to use. Super reliable for all sorts of images, not just portraits, and a great selection of basic free filters. Ive tried many photo editors but I always fall back on this one.

You can do so much without having to pay which is great. I use this app for basically all my photos, there's a lot of things you can do with it. Of course there could be more, which is why it's only 4 stars and not 5, but I've tested a lot of similar apps and haven't found one as good as this especially one that's free. I'd absolutely recommend it.

Best app i have ever used. I love this app. It jus gets better and is so easy to use. Would recommend this app for easy editing of photos. The results are fantastic. Thanks for a great app. So much to use and so easy.

I enjoy using the Bokeh/Blurs out the unnecessary things & pulls in the subjects you want to focus on. The "Crop" feature is "awesome" too. "Vignette" feature is very, cool too! It darkens around the subjects & it frames around them with shade. Thank You, for the great, options.

Why did you remove the choice to watch the videos to unlock the looks? When I first got the app it was 3 uses per video. Then 2, then 1... Now none. This app was great... I won't be forced to pay so much to use it now though Time to get a different app.

title: Selfie Queen - Social Star

> Try a fun new hairstyle - your followers will love it!

comments: Overall, pretty good app & I like the features but so many of them are "premium" features. I'd be very inclined to pay for the premium features with a few extra things added... In the Artbot feature, I wish there were the option to choose a percentage of the filter being added, rather than either 100% or nothing. Also, some of the "beauty" features have the ability to adjust the placement settings but some do not like the eyebrows. An overall face adjustment (for placement) would be great!

Right off the bat I can see it has all the features any good photo beautifying app should have... HOWEVER, I cannot choose to swap the person being "edited" in a multi person photo.... My face is entirely visible in a photo of me and my toddler... Yet I can't choose to switch to my own face. Bummer.
Great app. Was worth purchasing. It works well and is easy to use!
Works great in umidigi a5 pro. The options are fun and looks cool, you can edit eyeshadow, eyebags, add color filters and reshape stuff.
This app is actually great for removing little blemishes in photos. Thanks!

title: Eye Candy - Selfie Camera
description:
** If you are looking for a photo app with tons of filters, professional photo editor and easy to use, Eye Candy camera is the one. **


It‚Äôs selfie time! 
With beautiful filters you can take beautiful selfies and photos in seconds anytime and anywhere!
Join people from all over the world taking selfies with Eye Candy Selfie Camera.

Don‚Äôt miss out on Eye Candy Selfie Camera‚Äôs amazing features:

‚úì Look beautiful on every photo. Use Eye Candy Selfie Camera for moments to remember. 
‚úì Eye Candy Selfie Camera is a professional selfie camera for your device. Create beautiful selfies in seconds with many filter effects to choose from. 
‚úì Adjust live filters to your specific needs, there are infinite adjustments possibilities.  Don‚Äôt settle for less than perfection. Eye Candy Selfie Camera allows you to set each filter in details. You can literally shoot the same moment billion ways and share it with others.
‚úì Edit photos with professional photo editing software included in Eye Candy selfie camera to achieve perfection with every photo. 
‚úì Share photos with your friends on your favorite social media. 

‚úì Awesome filters will make your photos look amazing!
‚úì Selfie filter effects will make your skin look clear and beautiful!
‚úì Real time live filters for perfect results
‚úì Auto beauty is just click on perfect filter away!
‚úì Iconic, Unique, Basic, Artistic filters
‚úì Add Eye Candy‚Äôs filters to your existing photos
‚úì Fix even the smallest imperfections with included photo editing software.
‚úì Professional photo editing software is easy to use and you can master it within minutes.
‚úì Collage: take multiple photos and save as one. Choose from many collage styles and grids. It is like a photo booth but with amazing filter effects. Why only take one selfie at a time?
‚úì Silent mode: turn on or off shutter sound, timer sound and other sounds. No one will her you making selfies. Never feel embarrassed to take a selfie!
‚úì Vignette filter that can be fully adjusted for perfect result
‚úì Retro filters will make your photos look like a thing from the past.
‚úì Get full control over brightness, contract, sharpness, gamma, sepia white balance saturation hue, shade, color tint and many other essential photo adjustments.
‚úì Use more than one filter on each photo. Take picture with one filter and add other filters later. Eye Candy Selfie Camera will keep previous versions of your photos so have no fear of mistakes or bad editing.
‚úì Switch between front facing and back facing camera. Use Eye Candy Selfie Camera for beautiful landscape photos. 
‚úì Are you a foodie / food lover? You can even create beautiful food pictures with Eye Candy camera. Bring the juiciness out with amazing filters and share the tasty moments on social networks.
‚úì Share your perfect selfies and photos with your friends using our easy to share function to social media like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and other apps installed on your device.
‚úì Timer: take photos hands free or use selfie stick.
‚úì Take photos with pressing volume button on your device.
‚úì Add Geo Tag to your photos to remember where they were taken (requires location permission)
‚úì Emergency selfie widget
‚úì Screen flash for front facing camera

** Once you start using Eye Candy Selfie Camera you will understand why people from all around the world consider it the best camera app out there. **

Create photos so beautiful they melt in viewers‚Äô eyes.

Eye Candy Selfie Camera: For Moments to Remember!

title: Lica Cam - selfie cam, beauty cam, photo edit
description:
Create beautiful and natural looking stylish selfie with your fingertips by using fully featured Lica Pro! See your selfies come to live with a simple touch of Motion Stickers. You can also add your favorite Music both from Lica Pro and your own collection. And create a live show by taking amazing short video with hilarious stickers. Moreover, real time skin Beautifying function and Filters make you look flawless in every photo.
With Lica Pro add filters and special effects, blur photos and so much more. It gives you so many options and better control over what your photos are going to look like!
 
‚òÖStickers & Filters
- It comes with various categorized stickers and special filters for those who like to take selfies! Decorate your selfie by the variety of stickers including motion ones!
- Bring your selfies to live, take a video selfie with a diverse range of stickers accompanied by amusive music.
- Preview your photo or video before capturing with a real-time filter.
- Experience the ultimate collection of accessories, wore a headpiece of cute animals and hilarious props.
- Use make-up stickers for video selfies with fiends and families.
 
‚òÖBeauty function
- You get a choice of default instant beauty effect which can bring out skin tone and visual ambience to give you exactly the look and feel you want for the selfie!
- Lica Pro also let you modify every detail of your photo, you can enlarge your eyes or get rid of wrinkles of your selfie just by moving right and left of a scale. Create super natural looking selfies with a couple of taps, take beautiful selfies anywhere and anytime!
 
Key Features
- Live selfie camera with various effect which can be previewed before the snap.
- Real-time face detection.
- Real-time filters, specially designed for selfies.
- Smart auto beautifying function.
- Short video show.

title: phoTWO - selfie collage camera
description:
Fun camera app from the author of Pho.to Lab photo editor!

You are a very important person. That‚Äôs why it‚Äôs a good idea to be the subject of all the photos you make.

You can make a gorgeous photo of a double rainbow, an impressive shot of a magnificent building in Barcelona or a silly picture of your friends having fun, but that‚Äôs only one half of the story. You are the other one. And you‚Äôre just as significant. Your emotions, your reaction and your smile should not be left out. Complement any photo with a bit of your personality.

phoTWO will help you always be in the focus of all your photo stories. Make the main photo with the rear camera. Then photograph yourself with the front cam of your phone. That‚Äôs about it. phoTWO will take care of the rest. You will end up with an elegant collage made with both of your photos. The pictures will blend together beautifully. And though you can tweak the collage, you will most probably want to leave everything intact. Just because the original collage will be stunning.

Main highlights of phoTWO:

- Make your collages look exactly what you want them to look: move, rotate and crop the front cam photo to achieve perfection.
- Decorate your selfie with uniquely designed frames.
- Use phoTWO instead of the standard Camera app: you can take ordinary photos with
your rear camera or make beautiful collages. Any result is automatically saved to your Gallery.
- Share your works of art on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest and more at no time.

Now you know how to become the center of attention. Download phoTWO now and become the major part of your photo stories!

ps: for best examples of funny and beautiful photos, taken with phoTWO, follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/pho_two

title: Selfie A Day
description:
Use this app to take a selfie a day and save them in a folder for future production of a time-lapse movie.

The idea is simple and familiar to a lot of people, take selfie everyday, put them all exactly on top of one another, and you will get a time-lapse video of your growth. This is a very time consuming task if done manually and it is cool but don't have the time or just don't have the reminder and forget to take the picture everyday.

So here is a solution for you. This app will give you a great tool to take unique selfies because it gives you a face frame or your latest selfie on the camera preview for you to adjust your face exactly the same position every selfie. Even if you miss it, it will use face detection features to align all your faces on top of one another when creating a movie out of them with lots of other options for you to control for the final movie.

You can view or directly share your video with your friends or loved ones from the video creation page and keep a copy of it in your gallery.

Best of all, since you may want to keep doing it for a long time, maybe a lifetime, you can backup and restore your photos with your Google drive so you can always have them on all of your devices or if you get a new phone after a while.

What you can use this app for:
* See you change/grow 
* Watch your hair grow 
* Your beard? Movember
* Your baby growing up 
* Getting a nice tan 
* Time lapse putting on makeup or Face paint
* Your plants growing and flourishing
* Lots of other ideas...

title: Selfie Expert HD Camera
description:
Become Selfie expert using Selfie EXP HD Camera app. We have created amazing filters inspired by nature and some of the greatest artists of the 20th Century. From now on you can apply filters only on certain part of the picture and to use Face Detection so the filter is tracking your face. Amaze your friends with the artistic expert photos from our camera app.
‚òÖ Amazing artistic filters 
Use filters inspired by nature and artists. We have created filters which have never been seen before. Swipe left or right to change filters. Filter preview is shown in real-time in HD so you can see result from each filter instantly. You can also adjust filter and noise levels manually.
‚òÖ Unique Magic Tools 
For the first time on mobile, Selfie expert Camera is bringing you the Magic Tools. Magic Tools allows you to pick an area where to apply the filter and leave the rest of the photo intact. You can also use Face Detection so the filter is applied only to your face. Have fun and explore the endless possibilities of Magic Tools.
‚òÖ Expert Photo Editor
Once you have taken your photo you can use Photo Editor to make it even more beautiful. Now you can use tools like Smudge, Blemishes remover, Facelift, whitening, color balance and many more.

Create beautiful collages with different masks, vignettes and filters. Let out your beauty and creativity with Selfie Expert Camera.
